column4: hey guys. i have a sonicwall 2040 in the office here, i ssh to my web server over in germany, and if i leave it unattended for a few minutes, i get cut off, i'm convinced it's something on my router, any suggestsions as to what i should change to solve this annoyance
seen the problem before, can't recall how it got fixed.. some timeout for idle connections I think.
thanks illl have to google a bit more
